snippet: When Senator John McCain of Arizona faced questions about meeting constitutional qualifications for the presidency because of his birth in the Panama Canal Zone, Ms. McCaskill of Missouri came to his defense. But she is not exactly extending a helping hand for Senator Ted Cruz, Republican of Texas, who faces similar questions about his birth in Canada.
abstract: When Senator John McCain of Arizona faced questions about meeting constitutional qualifications for the presidency because of his birth in the Panama Canal Zone, Ms. McCaskill of Missouri came to his defense. But she is not exactly extending a helping hand for Senator Ted Cruz, Republican of Texas, who faces similar questions about his birth in Canada.

headline.main: Of Ted Cruz’s Birth Status, Senator Claire McCaskill Says, ‘I Think It’s a Question’
